Downloads

Download the starter kit to get started.

  • UIKernel v0.16.0 (development)
  • UIKernel v0.16.0 (production)

The uncompressed, development version of UI Kernel core.

<script src="/uikernel/uikernel-0.16.0.js"></script>

The compressed, production version of UI Kernel core.

<script src="/uikernel/uikernel-0.16.0.min.js"></script>

NPM

$ npm install uikernel
